short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamlines OSHA's database searches. Select text, click to consolidate results into one page. Not affiliated with OSHA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select an establishment's name and click on the extension button. 

Our Chrome extension simplifies searches within the OSHA Establishment database by consolidating search results onto a single page, bypassing the need to navigate through multiple paginated results. 

This utility-focused tool is designed to enhance efficiency for users by providing a straightforward method to access comprehensive search outcomes promptly. It's particularly useful for safety officers, researchers, and anyone requiring detailed OSHA data without the usual navigation hassle. 

Please note, this extension is developed independently and is not affiliated with OSHA.
